name: Agricatch
body:
This library started as an algorithm I wrote in Vanilla PHP, then moved to Yii, and finally came to my senses and rewrote the entire thing on Python (with a little help from my friend Django). To get some sense into what's going on, try the following: `python manage.py syncdb`
`python manage.py doimport gizmodo` More to follow!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
